error.mqtt: Sorry, there was a communication error with the Snips platform
error.config: Sorry, there was an error with your config file.
error.locale: Sorry, there was an error with your language settings.
error.places: Sorry, there was an error with your location data.
error.defaultLocation: Sorry, your default location was not found
error.slots: Sorry, there was an error with your location specifications
error.place: Sorry, the location you asked was not found.
error.country: Sorry, the country you asked was not found.
error.intentNotRecognized: Sorry, I did not understand your request.
error.intersection: Sorry, the time period should be within 5 days from now.
error.APIResponse: Sorry, there was an issue with the service provider.
error.APIRequest: Sorry, the service provider is unreachable.
error.API: Sorry, there was an issue with your data retrieving.
error.localisation: Sorry, this localisation is not supported.

warning.truncatedIntervals: Sorry, I can only predict the weather within five days from now.

quantifier: it is expected to be {{- weather }}
it is going to be {{- weather }}
qualifier: there is going to be {{- weather }}

with temperatures ranging between {{ minTemp }} and {{ maxTemp }} degrees
with temperatures between {{ minTemp }} to {{ maxTemp }} degrees

and it will be {{ temperature }} degrees

the temperatures will range between {{ minTemp }} to {{ maxTemp }} degrees
